translation.en: -Here you go. -♪ Nails, hair, hips, heels ♪

[Mavis] Ooh! Looking good.
Let me see this right here.
Perfect.
Oh, did you know your hand is making a fist?
Sorry. I'm just nervous. First Essence shoot.

translation.en: Repeat after me.
I am worthy. I am perfect. I am enough.
translation.es: Lo valgo. Soy perfecta. Soy suficiente.

translation.en: I am worthy. I am perfect. I am enough.
translation.es: Lo valgo. Soy perfecta. Soy suficiente.

translation.en: You got this, bitch. Just breathe.
-Okay. -Hey.
Yeah?
Marissa's dress won't stay up, and she scratched me, definitely on purpose.

translation.en: Okay. Just put some double-stick tape on her titties. And… let's see.

Do you know models and toddlers have the same diet?
-Copy that. Also Trent wants to see you. -Yes, he does.

-♪ I work… ♪ -Beautiful.
Here you go.

This is exactly what you asked for.
Mavis?
I… I'll figure it out.

-I'm not a mind reader. -[man] Yes.
I hope this isn't too forward, but I know beauty when I see it,
translation.es: Espero no ser demasiado directo, pero detecto muy rápido la belleza,

translation.en: and the camera loves you.
Is that right? Well, it must be my drumstick-emoji physique.

translation.en: It's meaty on top, nubby on the bottom. Very delicious.

[man] Yes.
They could never afford me, honey.
-[camera clicking] -[man] Sorry, baby. That's it.
-I can't take anymore. Come here. -Oh, come on. What?

translation.en: [Trent] Yuck.
Mavis, you're distracting genius.
-[Mavis] Huh. -Don't worry about him.
All right. When we're done, I have to do a bunch of stuff for him. I'm gonna meet Khalil, so I'm gonna be home late.

translation.en: -Yeah, I love you so much. -I love you, baby.

I'm coming. God!
[woman] It's just…
I don't like it. It's not working.
-[woman] Trent, I don't like it. -Okay, message received, Sydney.

-On it. -♪ Girl ♪
-♪ I don't play, I slay ♪ -Yes!
-Okay, so wait until I tell you. -[model] Gotcha.

It's gonna be fire.

Okay. Now!
-This is beautiful. -♪ Drop for me… ♪
[Sydney] Looks like a butterfly, a fashion butterfly. I love this.

All right!
Trent, why didn't you think of this?
Mark that one. Mark that one. You know what? Just mark them all.

translation.en: -Hi. -Oh, hi.
Nice to meet you. I'm such a fan.
Well, now I can say the same about you.

translation.en: Thank you.
Syd, you know, obviously, it's time for Mavis to move to lead stylist.

-Thank you, baby! -Awesome, baby. You got this.
-[Mavis] Hey. -[man] Hey.
Sorry I'm running late.
Trent sent me all over town returning shit. Let me tell you somethin'. I am so over assisting.

translation.en: All good. I'm running behind myself.
Good game.
Okay, quit playing. Trying to make me do overtime, knowing I got somewhere to go.

Let's just call her basket bae.

-[man chuckles] -Listen, I had to stop home.
I've had to pee for 42 whole-ass minutes. You know I'm too cute for a public toilet.

translation.en: Bitch, please. But I started to pee just a little bit.

What in the actual fuck, Jacque?

Mavis, no. Think about what you're doing before you do it. -Don't go all Jersey on us. -[Mavis grunts]

[shrieking] What?

Get off of me!
Get off!
♪ One time For the big girls in the crowd ♪

[Mavis screaming] Fuck him!

Oh no, no. Don't take that. That's Jacque's. It stays.

That's the trip where he asked me to move in with him.

translation.en: It was like a princess fairy tale.

translation.en: Look at this place.
Look at him.
Look at you.
Look, I know Jacque come from money, but you held him down.

translation.en: You supported that man emotionally and financially, right?

translation.en: Don't forget that.
You pulled your own, working them two jobs.

translation.en: Waitressing at night and then being his studio manager during the day?

translation.en: -Come on. -Yeah, fuck that dude. You know what?

translation.en: -I did hold his ass down. For many years. -Mm-hmm.

translation.en: Like, how fucking hurtful and basic.
And you know what people say.

-Mave. -Khalil.

that's them trying to stroke they own ego.

don't you always be the one saying thick girls having a moment?

What you need?
Just give us a minute.
Okay.
Wait. Is that my jacket, fam?
My nigga, you got way bigger problems than this jacket.

Right now I'm so, so sorry. We can't throw five years away.

We're supposed to be married,
have kids,
do all that Bonnie and Clyde shit.

Where you gonna go?
I'mma keep it moving and keep my plants watered.

Do I look crazy? I feel crazy.
Yes, you look crazy.
I'm moving you to Brooklyn to live with a total stranger…

translation.en: Yes.
…who could be a serial killer, or worse, an investment banker.

Yeah. Sounds… Yeah. Oh shit, Mavis. Get up.

-We gotta go. We gotta go. -Why? Lisa Bonet top hat.

When you gonna stop running from women you slept with? We are 38 years old!

Sorry my friend's a ho!
It's an emergency!

Hello?
Mavis, hi!
-Hi! -Hi. Welcome! Welcome!
Namaste.
To you too. So nice to finally meet you, Jade.

-Oh! -Yeah, I feng shui-ed it and everything.

and now there's a greasy film, like, inside of my hand,

And, yeah, any time, like, my body needs love, I rub it in.

I think I will not do that.

-[Jade] It's my kitty cat. It's Coco. -Oh.

[whispers] I, um…
I don't know.

-Lord! -Wow. Lord Jesus.

Oh shit! Camden?
-Damn, Mavis! How you be? -Good.
Oh my goodness. What's up? What you doing in these parts?

Something like that. Two years, yeah.
Yo, those agency days were fun.

Oh shit! Was that a compliment from Mavis Beaumont?
I look good? You look good.

translation.en: Thank you.
Let me buy you a drink, boo.
Sure. Why not? I'll stay for one more. Let's catch up.

Yeah. Yeah. It's dangerous in these streets.

I actually have a shot at my first lead styling gig.

-Yeah. -I'm meeting her tomorrow.

because one man's trash is another man's treasure. You feel me?

and I'm really sorry, um, and…

translation.es: Lo siento, pero esto no funcionará.

translation.en: [Camden] It's a particle-board bookshelf.
translation.es: Es solo una estantería de aglomerado.

translation.en: I mean, it ain't all that, but, you know, it's…
You put my bed frame together too.
translation.es: También armaste la cabecera de mi cama.

translation.en: He also fixed the tub.
And you fixed the tub?
Look, I am fresh out of a relationship,
and, um, quite frankly, you shouldn't be so available for a person
translation.es: Y, francamente, no deberías estar tan disponible para una persona

translation.en: when you don't know how they feel about you.
translation.es: si no sabes qué siente por ti.

translation.en: You are a great guy. Honestly, you are. You, um…
translation.es: Eres un gran tipo. Honestamente, sí. Eres como un sujetador bien hecho, cariño.

translation.en: You are like a well-made bra, honey. You are supportive and uplifting,
translation.es: Eres un gran tipo. Honestamente, sí. Eres como un sujetador bien hecho, cariño. Das apoyo y sostén.

translation.en: and your positive affirmations are so dope,
translation.es: Y tus afirmaciones positivas son geniales.

translation.en: and boy, you are very good at other stuff too.
translation.es: Y, cielos, eres muy bueno en otras cosas.

translation.en: I'm talkin' 'bout the pussy stuff, Camden.
Very nice. Thank you so much.
Camden, there is somebody out there for you,
translation.es: Camden, hay alguien ideal para ti,

translation.en: and she's gonna be so lucky when she finds you.
translation.es: y tendrá mucha suerte cuando te encuentre.

translation.en: Damn, ma.
I'm just glad you told me that shit and kept it 100.
translation.es: Me alegra que me lo dijeras y que fueras sincera.

translation.en: Yo, I usually just get ghosted, but this was real as fuck.
translation.es: En general, solo me ignoran, pero esto fue muy real.

translation.en: Come here, man. Let me get a hug.
translation.es: Ven aquí. Te daré un abrazo.

translation.en: I need my wrench back.
Thank you.
-Mavis Beaumont, wake up! -Oh, oh!
I'm up.
I'm up. Why you gotta scare me like that?
translation.es: Estoy despierta. ¿Por qué me asustas así?

translation.en: How are you indoors but still look homeless?
translation.es: Aún parece que no tienes un techo.

translation.en: Okay, that's not nice.
Why aren't you ready? I thought we was gonna go eat before your meeting?
translation.es: No estás lista. Iríamos a comer antes de tu reunión.

translation.en: Oh. What time is it? I gotta call Sydney and reschedule.
translation.es: ¿Qué hora es? Debo llamar a Sydney y reprogramarla.

translation.en: -I can't do this now. -No, no.
-What are you doing? -Man, you ain't rescheduling.
translation.es: - Hoy no puedo. ¿Qué haces? - No. - No reprogramarás. - ¿Qué? Devuélvemelo.

translation.en: Uh-uh. Give me my phone back. What you doin'?
-No. -Give me my phone back.
-What are you doing? -Why are your arms so long?
Why do you know so many weird guys?
She takin' a bagel in the bathroom?
translation.es: ¿Está yendo al baño con un pan?

translation.en: I am not letting you miss out on this opportunity.
translation.es: No dejaré que te pierdas esta oportunidad.

translation.en: Khalil, I am exhausted,
and I don't have the energy to start over.
translation.es: y no tengo energía para empezar de nuevo.

translation.en: I can't go in there and be my dynamic self.
translation.es: No puedo entrar ahí y ser mi versión dinámica.

translation.en: I just got cheated on.
I need time to heal.
Plus, last night, I had some cardamom and strange dick,
translation.es: Y anoche comí cardamomo y pene de extraño,

translation.en: so I'm digesting a lot of things right now.
translation.es: así que estoy digiriendo muchas cosas.

translation.en: Mavis, night one?
I mean…
Look, you not ready for this. Also, with who?
translation.es: Mira, aún no estás lista. Además, ¿con quién?

translation.en: You remember Camden from the agency? Not fucked-up-teeth, can't high-five?
translation.es: - ¿Recuerdas a Camden de la agencia? - ¿Dientes feos que no choca los cinco?

translation.en: Yeah. He just got a new motorcycle jacket from Macy's, and I don't know what happened.
translation.es: Sí. Compró una chaqueta de motociclista en Macy's, y no sé qué pasó.

translation.en: It was like a ghetto episode of British Bake Off,
translation.es: Fue como un episodio del gueto de Bake Off británico,

translation.en: but just with dick and street meat.
translation.es: pero con pene y carne de la calle.

translation.en: And I'm not talking 'bout the dick being the street meat, but it could've been.
translation.es: El pene no fue la carne de la calle, pero podría haberlo sido.

translation.en: I didn't know what the fuck I was eatin'.
translation.es: No sabía qué carajo estaba comiendo.

translation.en: Khalil, now you know why I gotta cancel.
translation.es: Khalil, ahora sabes por qué debo cancelar.

translation.en: No, no. You cannot cancel.
Look, stop telling yourself no before somebody else tells you no.
translation.es: Deja de decirte que no antes de que otro te lo diga.

translation.en: That's beautiful.
-Let me ask you this. Rapid fire. -All right. Hit me.
translation.es: Te preguntaré algo rápido. Está bien. Pregunta.

translation.en: How long you been talking about being lead stylist? Like, in years?
translation.es: - ¿Hace cuánto que quieres esto? - Varios años, quizá.

translation.en: How many times you had the opportunity to be lead stylist?
None.
How many times you been to work for something really important hungover?
translation.es: ¿Cuántas veces has trabajado con resaca en algo muy importante?

translation.en: -How many Mondays in a year? -Exactly. Come on, girl. You can do this.
translation.es: ¿Cuántos lunes hay en un año? Exacto. Vamos, amiga. Tú puedes.

translation.en: Now, go find a pencil and draw on some eyebrows,
translation.es: Bien. Busca un lápiz y dibújate unas cejas.

translation.en: and then put them dots under your eyes to do whatever that do.
translation.es: Ponte eso en los ojos para lo que sea que sirva.

translation.en: -What do you call that stuff? -It's concealer.
Conceal that shit, okay? And do whatever else women do to get ready.
translation.es: Corrige esa mierda, ¿sí? Haz lo necesario para estar lista.

translation.en: A'ight? Get you some ibuprofen and coconut water, and go get that shit.
translation.es: ¿Sí? Toma un ibuprofeno y agua de coco, y ve a triunfar.

translation.en: -♪ What you gonna let them see? ♪ -[Sydney] Wow. Yeah, I'm liking this.
translation.es: Vaya. Sí, me gusta lo que veo.

translation.en: I love it. You're so talented, Mavis.
translation.es: Me encanta. Eres muy talentosa, Mavis.

translation.en: -These are gorgeous mock-ups. -Thank you.
I could see Jacque really running with this. He's so good with movement.
translation.es: Y con Jacque sería ideal. Es muy bueno con el movimiento.

translation.en: Yeah. Jacque is… really good with movement.
translation.es: Sí, Jacque es muy bueno con el movimiento.

translation.en: I, um… I don't think it's a great idea for us to collaborate on this together, though.
translation.es: Pero no creo que sea buena idea que colaboremos en esto.

translation.en: -Really? -Mm-hmm.
Because he said he'd only shoot this if you were the lead stylist.
translation.es: Dijo que solo lo haría si eras la estilista principal.

translation.en: -He did? -[Jacque] Hey, babe.
Sydney, didn't I tell you how amazing she is?
translation.es: Sydney, ¿no te dije que era increíble?

translation.en: She's great.
No. Mm-mm. No.
No, thank you. Absolutely not. I am not doing this.
translation.es: No, gracias. Claro que no. No lo haré.

translation.en: -I'm sorry? -Mavis, don't be ridiculous.
What's happening here? Did I miss something?
Jacque and I are no longer working together, okay?
translation.es: Jacque y yo ya no trabajamos juntos.

translation.en: And I would love to stand here and say it's either him or me, but I already know how that's gonna go, so…
translation.es: Me encantaría decir que debes elegir, pero ya sé cómo terminará eso, así que…

translation.en: I just wanna make sure that the answer is…
Yeah, it's gonna be him.
Thank you for my iPad.
Mavis?
-Mavis, please. -What?
All right, just take a minute. I know you're upset with me,
translation.es: Espera un minuto. Sé que estás enojada, pero separa las cosas.

translation.en: but just try and leave the emotion out of this.
translation.es: Sé que estás enojada, pero separa las cosas.

translation.en: I can help get this career off the ground--
Let me stop you right there, okay? Please do not flatter yourself.
translation.es: No sigas, ¿sí? Y, por favor, no te halagues.

translation.en: I have everything I need to make my own way.
translation.es: Tengo todo lo necesario para abrirme camino.

translation.en: Jacque, I loved you, and I would've done anything for you.
translation.es: Jacque, te amaba y habría hecho cualquier cosa por ti.

translation.en: But my identity got mixed up with yours, and I let you take the lead.
translation.es: Pero mi identidad se mezcló con la tuya, y te dejé tomar la iniciativa, y me perdí.

translation.en: And I got lost. But you know what?
translation.es: Pero mi identidad se mezcló con la tuya, y te dejé tomar la iniciativa, y me perdí. Pero ¿sabes qué? Aquí estoy, mierda.

translation.en: Here the fuck I am.
♪ Mm-mm-mm ♪ ♪ Yeah ♪
